amendment.description: Amendment requires HUD to publish model guidelines for minimum heating requirements for units operated by public housing agencies receiving Federal assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in House Report 114-411 to require HUD to publish model guidelines for minimum heating requirements for units operated by public housing agencies receiving federal assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Meng.
